analysis.description:
ATMint.claimToken (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#486-512) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- unClaimedToken[_user] == 0
	- currentStage == 0

Reentrancy in ATMint.claimReward (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#465-479):
	External calls:
	- atmToken.transfer(_founder,rewards) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#476-478)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- doOnce (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#479)

	- lockToken(contribution.investorDeposit(),tokenToFounder) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#404-407)

	- unClaimedToken (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#404-407)

ATMint.claimReward (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#465-479) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-atmToken.transfer(_founder,rewards) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#476-478)

ATMint.claimToken (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#486-512) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-atmToken.transfer(_user,tmp) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#508)

ATMint.collect has external calls inside a loop:
	- dailyContributedETH = cast(contribution.dailyTotals(day)) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#422-423)

ATMint.collect has external calls inside a loop:
	- userContributedETH = cast(contribution.userBuys(day,_user)) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#425)

ATMint.claimReward has external calls inside a loop:
	- contribution.dailyTotals(day) == 0 (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#473-476)

ATMint.migrateUserData has external calls inside a loop:
	- i < atmToken.getATMHoldersNumber() (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol)

ATMint.migrateUserData has external calls inside a loop:
	- LogMigrate(atmToken.ATMHolders(i),atmToken.balances(atmToken.ATMHolders(i))) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol)

Reentrancy in ATMint.collect (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#415-450):
	External calls:
	- rate = wdiv(cast(tokenToContributor),cast(contribution.totalContributedETH())) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#436-439)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributedToken (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#443-445)
	- unClaimedToken (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#443-445)

ATMToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#253)
ATMint.fundingStartTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0xb23fecec4202b868c228ac0a59cc12a9f93bd605.sol#358-359)
